column5: RIGL the boat is taken over by shorts bears and pessimists I smell a loading zone
RIGL had to reduce my position here money to be made elsewhere
RIGL there have to be some institutions that have seen more than a fifty percent decline in just the past year and are heading for the door as the chart starts to get uglier and uglier
RIGL if this doesnt move after EMA approval in Q3Q4 Im done with this company if that isnt going to move it than nothing will
RIGL and just as I wrote my prior message the graphs diverge this is the whackiest stock Ive ever seen it doesnt seem to have any real underlying value

look at a graph of RIGL today and a graph of todays DJIA or IBB or XBI its the basically same graph there are options on this 2 stock as well pray there isnt another 500 point blowoff in the Dow anytime soon
RIGL welp looks like my prediction yesterday is gonna be right
